授業目的: Students will obtain some basic knowledge of environmental studies with a specific focus on the identification of problems in environmental, pollutants, including analytical knowledge which analyzes the technology of destructive and non-destructive methods.
到達目標: Some previous and new result of environmental research, published in high impact factor journal, will be given to them and it will make some students have some idea with the Environmental-related researches
授業方法: The theories, flowchart, pathway, presentation, and Environmental-related video will be taught via slides of power points. Some of the questions will be given to students during the lectures in order to evaluate their understanding of this lecture.

第1回: Basic concept - interactions between biota - the concept of habitat and environment and ecological niches-Identification of limiting factors - Energy flow – food chain – food web in various latitude levels – ecological- Pyramids and recycling – biotic community – concept – structure – dominance - fluctuation and succession and structure cycle in nature.
第2回: Concept and theories of population ecology - community structure - ecosystem dynamics and management - stability and complexity of Ecosystems - speciation and extinctions - environmental impact assessment - the principle of conservation - conservation strategic - sustainable development.
第3回: Environmental pollution (types of pollution) – analytical technology for the measurement of pollution - methodology of environmental management - the problem-solving approach and its limitations - air pollution and its control through biotechnology.
第4回: Global environmental problems - ozone depletion – UV - Greenhouse effect and acid rain - their impact in biotechnological approaches for management.
第5回: Water pollution and control - analytical technology for measurement and sources water pollution – kind of aquatic habitats - distribution and impact of environmental factors on the aquatic biota.
第6回: Wastewater treatment - wastewater collection – chemical properties of water – physical-chemical and biological treatment processes - activated sludge - oxidation ditches - trickling filter – towers - rotating discs - oxidation ponds.
第7回: Biopesticides in integrated pest management - bioremediation of contaminated soils and wastelands - solid waste - sources and management (composting, vermiculture, and methane production) - environmental mutagenesis and toxicity testing
第8回: The history of herbs - medical herbs - harvesting and drying herbs – aromatherapy - harvesting & drying herbs.
第10回: Distribution and storage of toxicant - biotransformation – elimination of toxicant - target organ toxicity, environmental toxicant - risk assessment.
第11回: Conventional detection - destructive method such as vimentin, intermediate filament, actin - apoptotic – necrotic - tunnel kit
第12回: Conventional detection- transmission electron microscopy - scanning electron microscopy.
第13回: Monitoring with light – Spectroscopy – Atomic spectra – molecular spectra – scattering
第14回: Monitoring with remote sensing – unconventional - detection by satellite – remote sensing
トピック.授業外学習2: Master students have to prepare by themselves concerning the knowledge of some Environmental studies based on the textbook or international journal that we offer as references. During the class, there will be a temporary discussion in order to evaluate whether the students understand or not.
